text: Sin City is a 2005 American crime thriller movie written, produced and directed by Frank Miller and Robert Rodriguez. It is based on Miller's graphic novel series of the same name. The main actors in it are Jessica Alba, Brittany Murphy, Benicio Del Toro, Clive Owen, Mickey Rourke, Bruce Willis and Elijah Wood. Sin City received mostly positive reviews. This movie has a sequel called Sin City: A Dame to Kill For. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2005 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Dark Horse Comics movies Category:Film noir Category:Movies directed by Robert Rodriguez
title: Sin City (movie)
